title: Gurmehak Kaur
text:
🧠 Work Experience

📌 Apple — Engineering Program Manager (Jul 2021 – Present)

Lead programs for the Video Engineering team, coordinating cross-functional efforts in San Diego.
Deliver strategic initiatives and ensure technical execution at scale.



📌 ZS Associates — Analytics Consultant (Jun 2021 – Jul 2024)

Led commercial analytics for pharma clients: market access, drug launch, revenue leakage.
Created a KPI library for fraud detection ($11M impact).
Managed $13B sales data; automated workflows saving 70% turnaround time.



📌 UBC Centre for Brain Health — Data Scientist (May 2025 – Present)

Rebuilt data pipelines and dashboards for a neuroscience research lab.
Migrated workflows to PostgreSQL, and implemented clustering models with Streamlit.



📌 WriteLab — Business Operations Manager (2015–2016)

Worked full-time at an EdTech startup after freshman year.
Contributed to company growth until acquisition by Chegg.

title: Gurmehak Kaur
text:
📂 Projects

🧬 Deep Learning for Brain Signals
GitHub — UBC x University of Utah (2025)
Designed a biologically inspired RNN to analyze brain-muscle activity and model human balance.


💓 Mortality Risk Prediction in Heart Failure
GitHub — UBC (2024)
Built a logistic regression model to predict heart failure survival with 82% accuracy. Dockerized for deployment.


🪞 IoT Smart Mirror with Face Recognition
GitHub — NSIT (2021)
Created a smart mirror using deep learning, Raspberry Pi, and face recognition with Python + HTML.

title: Gurmehak Kaur
text:

🧠 Co-authored a deep learning chapter for Elsevier on disease diagnosis

🎓 Passionate about healthcare, research, and creative tech
